footer.tagline: Premium 3D printed products for your home, office, and creative projects.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Make The Print. All rights reserved.

home.headline: Bring Your Ideas to
home.subhead: Discover our collection of high-quality 3D printed items.
home.featuredSubhead: Handpicked designs showcasing the best of 3D printing innovation
home.customSubhead: Have a unique idea? We specialize in bringing your custom designs to life with precision 3D printing. From prototypes to personalized gifts, we're here to make your vision a reality.
home.emailUsDesc: Send us your design files or describe your project, and we'll provide a custom quote tailored to your needs.
home.whatsappDesc: Quick questions? Reach out to us on WhatsApp for fast responses and instant support.
home.customFooter: We can discuss pricing, materials, models, and turnaround time based on your specific project needs.

about.heroIntro: My dad and I started this because we love beautiful prints. Now we're here to share that with you.
about.storyP1: Honestly? My dad and I just really wanted to make cool printed stuff. We weren't trying to build some massive company—we just got tired of seeing mediocre prints out there. So we invested in some gear, learned the craft, and decided to do it our way.
about.storyP2: Right now, we've got a collection we're genuinely proud of. These are designs we've chosen because we think they look incredible when printed. But here's the thing—if you've got something specific in mind, just reach out. We love a challenge, and we'll do our best to make it happen.
about.storyP3: The plan? We want to keep growing. More printers, more products, a real online store. Every single person who orders from us is helping us get there. We're not some faceless company—it's literally my dad and me packing these boxes, making sure everything's perfect. When you support us, you're supporting two people who actually care about what they're doing.
about.qualityPrintsDesc: We print what we'd be proud to own
about.whatsComingIntro: We're just getting started. Here's what we're working on to make MakeThePrint even better for you:
about.newProductTypesDesc: Expanding beyond our current lineup into new categories you've been asking for
about.fasterTurnaroundDesc: Adding more printers so we can ship your orders even quicker
about.adventSpecialsDesc: Special advent collections for christmas, holidays, and seasonal moments
about.whatsComingThankYou: Every order, every customer, every moment of support gets us closer to these goals. Thank you for being part of our journey.

collections.title: Seasonal Collections
collections.subhead: Discover our exclusive holiday and seasonal collections. Limited edition designs perfect for gifting and special occasions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We typically ship within 2–3 business days. Delivery is 3–7 business days depending on your location.
faq.a2: We use quality PLA and PETG filaments. Custom orders can discuss other materials.
faq.q3: Can I cancel or change my order?
faq.a3: Contact us as soon as possible. We can modify or cancel orders that have not yet been shipped.
faq.a4: Yes. See our Refunds & Returns page for details.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.intro: We ship within Romania and internationally. Orders are processed within 2–3 business days.
shipping.romaniaDesc: Standard delivery: 3–5 business days. Free shipping on orders over 50 RON.
shipping.internationalDesc: Delivery times and costs depend on destination. We will confirm shipping cost at checkout where applicable.
shipping.trackingDesc: Once your order ships, we will send a confirmation email with tracking information. You can also check your order status in your account.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.body1: By using Make The Print you agree to these terms. We sell 3D printed products; by placing an order you agree to pay the stated price and accept our shipping and refund policies.
terms.body2: You may not use our site for any illegal purpose or to infringe others' rights. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel orders and to change these terms; continued use after changes means you accept the new terms.
terms.body3: For questions, contact us via the details on our website.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body1: We collect information you provide when ordering (name, address, email, phone) and use it to process orders, send confirmations, and provide support. We do not sell your data to third parties.
privacy.body2: We use cookies and similar tech for session and preferences. Payment data is handled by Stripe; we do not store full card details.
privacy.body3: You can request access to or deletion of your data by contacting us. By using our site you consent to this policy.

refunds.title: Refunds & Returns
refunds.body1: We want you to be satisfied. If an item arrives damaged or is not as described, contact us within 14 days of delivery with photos. We will arrange a replacement or refund.
refunds.body2: Refunds are issued to the original payment method within 5–10 business days after we approve the return. Custom or personalized items may not be eligible for return unless defective.
refunds.body3: To start a return, contact us with your order number and reason. Do not send items back until we confirm.
